comments:
I'm used to install eclipse plugins like optional add-ons. That way works well 
for our organization.
 
 
The way I used to do :
I  install eclipse 3.1 , and I unzip every plugin in its own directory I have 
created for him;then 
I bind every plugin by the following action.
Help/Software updates/Manage Configuration/Add an extension location.
 
It's worked well with all the plugins I've installed for more than one year, 
with all the versions of the cdt2.x, it works well with cdt-3.0.0RC1, but it 
doesn't work with cdt-3.0.0.
 
I've installed cdt like that on windows, and there is no problem with cdt 3.0.0
In the view error log of the configuration details, yjere are the following 
errors :
